Sex offender Liam Strange home for Christmas after prison sentence switched for home detention https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sex-offender-liam-strange-home-for-christmas-after-prison-sentence-switched-for-home-detention/GMM6MKESHRDSZBMZMPPHDS62FM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sex-offender-liam-strange-home-for-christmas-after-prison-sentence-switched-for-home-detention/GMM6MKESHRDSZBMZMPPHDS62FM/ Carolyne Meng-YeeSex offender appeals two-year prison sentence and wins, now faces home detention. Thu, 26 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Liam Strange pleaded guilty to sexual violation and interfering with a motor vehicle. His two-year prison sentence was reduced to nine months' home detention. Photo / Supplied

Today we hear from Jodi O'Donnell (TVNZ), Paul Thompson (RNZ), Duncan Greive (The Spinoff), Don Mann (Pacific Media Network), Deborah Pead (Pead PR) and Penelope Brown (Together).
